title: Seems legit riot.
body:
Had 7 lp to spare still.

Won the game and got demoted for it? In what dimension is that fair.

replies.body: git gud and you wont be demoted in the first place

It happens, not that much though. It actually happened to bjergsen, he won the game and he got demoted to diamond 1 from challenger ( this was before masters came out). Check the video out here:
https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=-Xqn2vme-04

This is a completely different mechanic.

This was back with how challenger used to run, in that if someone gets promoted into Challenger the lowest LP challenger gets demoted, and he happened to win the game with someone who was going to get promoted on his team, while he was the one that would be demoted, this mechanic doesn't exist in silver.
